name: Oro Jackson
text: Once Per Turn If your Character with a type including "Roger Pirates" would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

effect.text: If your Character with a type including "Roger Pirates" would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.
conditions: your Character with a type including "Roger Pirates" would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect
